DOC.brief_summary: The investigator test whether hypotonic ( dilute ) remodulin solution cause less pain eutonic ( undiluted ) solution supply manufacturer .
DOC.brief_title: Hypotonic Treprostinil Subcutaneous Infusion Control Treprostinil Related Site Pain
DOC.criteria: PAH standard criterion Treatment subcutaneous remodulin infusion least 3 month , stable dose 1 month Pain infusion site ( define > 8 McGill Pain Questionnaire ) Known pregnancy breastfeed
